about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: International Experience
about.bio: Fernando Campos, founder of Fields Barbers, honed his craft over nearly two years in Dublin, working at some of the city's most prestigious barbershops. His international experience and fluent English allow him to serve a diverse clientele, bringing the same level of excellence you'd find in Europe's finest barbershops to the heart of Córdoba.
